Wisdom: رَحِمَ اللَّهُ امْرَأً عَرَفَ قَدْرَهُ وَلَمْ يَتَعَدَّ طَوْرَهُ
enWisdom: May Allah have mercy on the one who knows his status and does not overstep his limits

Wisdom: كَفَى بِالْمَرْءِ جَهْلًا أَنْ يَجْهَلَ قَدْرَهُ
enWisdom: It suffices as ignorance for a person to be ignorant of his limits [and standing in society]
One who does not know his worth, transgresses his limits

Wisdom: مَنْ عَرَفَ قَدْرَهُ لَمْ يَضِعْ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ
enWisdom: One who knows his worth is not disparaged among the people

Wisdom: مَنْ قَوِيَ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ تَنَاهَى فِي الْقُوَّةِ
enWisdom: Whoever is able to gain control over his [carnal] self has attained the highest degree of strength

Wisdom: مَنْ وَقَفَ عِنْدَ قَدْرِهِ أَكْرَمَهُ النَّاسُ
enWisdom: One who remains within his rank [and does not overstep his limits] is honoured by the people
One who oversteps his limits is humiliated by the people

Wisdom: مَنْ جَهِلَ مَوْضِعَ قَدَمِهِ عَثَرَ بِدَوَاعِي نَدَمِهِ
enWisdom: One who is ignorant about the place where he steps is made to stumble by the reasons of his regret

Wisdom: مَنْ جَهِلَ قَدْرَهُ جَهِلَ كُلَّ قَدْرٍ
enWisdom: One who is ignorant of his own worth does not know anyone’s worth
He who oversteps his limits has not used his intellect
He who knows his worth does not get ruined
Ruined is the one who does not know his status

Wisdom: نِعِمَّا لِلْعَبْدِ أَنْ يَعْرِفَ قَدْرَهُ وَلَا يَتَجَاوَزَ حَدَّهُ
enWisdom: How good it is for a servant to know his status and not to overstep his limits!
Do not do that which will degrade your status

Wisdom: لَا جَهْلَ أَعْظَمُ مِنْ تَعَدِّي الْقَدْرِ
enWisdom: There is no ignorance greater than transgressing [beyond] one’s status

Wisdom: لَا عَقْلَ لِمَنْ يَتَجَاوَزُ حَدَّهُ وَقَدْرَهُ
enWisdom: One who transgresses his limits and his status has no intelligence
The greatest affliction is poverty of the soul
